hero.headline: Owner-operated cleanings with real attention to detail.
hero.subheadline: Cleaning Dirty provides reliable, careful house cleaning across Houston. Fast quotes, transparent communication, and a spotless finish every visit.

services.title: Services
services.intro: Clear, flexible options. Tell us what you need and we’ll tailor the clean.

items.title: Standard Clean
items.body: Weekly or bi-weekly upkeep. Kitchens, baths, floors, dusting, and tidy reset.

items.title: Deep Clean
items.body: Extra detail for baseboards, inside cabinets, fixtures, and buildup removal.

items.title: Move In / Move Out
items.body: Empty-home cleaning for a fresh start or a perfect handoff.

gallery.title: Cleaning In Action
gallery.intro: Real cleaning setups and tools that keep your home spotless.

how.title: How It Works
how.intro: Simple, fast, and built around your schedule.

steps.title: Request a quote
steps.body: Share your address, home size, and cleaning needs.

steps.title: Enjoy the reset
steps.body: Expect careful work and a clean you can feel immediately.

why.title: Why Cleaning Dirty
why.intro: Local, owner-operated service with a focus on trust and consistency.

items.title: Houston-based
items.body: We know local homes and the details that matter in this climate.

items.title: Simple pricing
items.body: Transparent quotes based on size and scope. No surprises.

items.title: Respectful care
items.body: Shoe covers available, careful handling, and a tidy finish every visit.

about.title: About Our Company
about.intro: Respect, service, and reliability are the core of how I work as a solo operator.

items.title: Respect for your home
items.body: I treat every space with care, protect surfaces, and leave everything exactly as it should be.

items.title: Service-minded approach
items.body: Clear communication, flexible scheduling, and a focus on your priorities every visit.

items.title: Consistency you can trust
items.body: Owner-operated cleanings for steady quality and accountability.

items.quote: Perfect attention to detail and super respectful in our home. Our kitchen looked brand new.
items.name: — Maria L., Midtown

items.quote: On time, professional, and the results were amazing. I’m booking every two weeks.
items.name: — James P., Heights

items.quote: Great communication and they listened to exactly what I needed cleaned.
items.name: — Aisha R., Westchase

contact.title: Get a Quote
contact.intro: Tell us about your home and preferred time. We’ll reply quickly.
contact.note: Please include the exact details of what you want cleaned so I can be fully prepared.
